title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 45.2 - General prohibitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 45.2 - General prohibitions

State Regulations
(a) No
person shall fail to comply with the provisions of this Part. (b) No person shall remove shellfish from
shellfish lands in the State for transplanting purposes, or receive or import
shellfish into the State for such purposes, without first obtaining a shellfish
transplant permit or a shellfish transplant harvester's permit or both, and a
shellfish digger's permit when required. (c) No person shall import shellfish into the

State for transplanting purposes which are not of a quality which in the
judgment of the commissioner will not adversely affect the existing shellfish
resources or the public health and safety. (d) No permittee shall violate the terms of
his or her permit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
45.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
